resources.j2c:J2CResourceAdapter.name: WebSphere Relational Resource Adapter
resources.j2c:J2CResourceAdapter.description: Built-in Relational Resource Adapter for Container Managed Persistence

resourceProperties.name: TransactionResourceRegistration
resourceProperties.description: Type of transaction resource registration (enlistment). Valid values are either "static" (immediate) or "dynamic" (deferred).

resourceProperties.name: InactiveConnectionSupport
resourceProperties.description: Specify whether connection handles support implicit reactivation. (Smart Handle support). Value may be "true" or "false".

resourceProperties.name: serverName
resourceProperties.description: This is a required property. The name of the Informix instance on the physical machine

resourceProperties.name: portNumber
resourceProperties.description: This is a required property. The TCP/IP port number of the Informix instance

resourceProperties.name: ifxIFXHOST
resourceProperties.description: This is a required property. The physical machine name.

resourceProperties.name: informixLockModeWait
resourceProperties.description: This is a required property.By default, Informix throws an exception when it cannot acquire a lock, rather than waiting for the current owner of the lock to release it. To modify this behavior, set this property to the number of seconds to wait for a lock. The default is 2 seconds. Any negative value means to wait forever

resourceProperties.name: informixAllowNewLine
resourceProperties.description: This property allows newLines to be added on a query String. Its disabled by default

resourceProperties.name: roleName
resourceProperties.description: The role name.

resourceProperties.name: description
resourceProperties.description: The description of this Data Source.

resourceProperties.name: loginTimeout
resourceProperties.description: The maximum time to attempt to connect a database. If this value is non-zero, attempt to connect to the database will timeout when this specified value is reached.

resourceProperties.name: ifxCPMMaxConnections
resourceProperties.description: The maximum number of physical connections that the datasource can obtain from the server, excluding those are returned to the server. Default value is -1 which means unlimited connections.

resourceProperties.name: ifxCPMMinAgeLimit
resourceProperties.description: The minimum number of the connections kept in the pool has exceeded the age limit. Default value is 0.

resourceProperties.name: ifxCPMMinPoolSize
resourceProperties.description: The minimum number of connections maintain in the pool. Default value is 0.

resourceProperties.name: ifxCPMMaxPoolSize
resourceProperties.description: The maximum number of connections maintain in the pool. When the pool reaches this size, all connections are returned to the server. The default value is 50.

resourceProperties.name: ifxCPMAgeLimit
resourceProperties.description: The time, in seconds, that is specified for a free connection is kept in a free connection pool. The default value is -1, that means the free connections are retained in the free pool until the client terminates.

resourceProperties.name: ifxCPMServiceInterval
resourceProperties.description: The pool service frequency, in milliseconds. Default is 50.

resourceProperties.name: ifxCPMInitPoolSize
resourceProperties.description: The initial number of connections to be allocated in a pool when a datasource is first instantiated and the pool is created. Default value is 0.

resourceProperties.name: ifxUSE_DTENV
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable USE_DTENV.

resourceProperties.name: ifxNEWLOCALE
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable NEWLOCALE.

resourceProperties.name: ifxPSORT_NPROCS
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable PSORT_NPROCS.

resourceProperties.name: ifxENABLE_TYPE_CACHE
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable ENABLE_TYPE_CACHE.

resourceProperties.name: ifxINFORMIXOPCACHE
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable INFORMIXOPCACHE.

resourceProperties.name: ifxLDAP_USER
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable LDAP_USER.

resourceProperties.name: ifxSQLH_FILE
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable SQLH_FILE.

resourceProperties.name: ifxDBUPSPACE
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable DBUPSPACE .

resourceProperties.name: ifxLDAP_URL
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable LDAP_URL.

resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable STMT_CACHE.

resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable TRACEFILE.

resourceProperties.name: ifxDBANSIWARN
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable DBANSTWARN.

resourceProperties.name: ifxDBSPACETEMP

resourceProperties.name: ifxPROXY
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable PROXY.

resourceProperties.name: ifxPLOAD_LO_PATH
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable PLOAD_LO_PATH.

resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable GL_DATETIME.

resourceProperties.name: ifxOPTCOMPIND
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable OPTCOMPIND.

resourceProperties.name: ifxDBDATE
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable DBDATE.

resourceProperties.name: ifxNODEFDAC
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable NODEFDAC.

resourceProperties.name: ifxIFX_AUTOFREE
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable IFX_AUTOFREE.

resourceProperties.name: ifxDBTIME
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable DBTIME.

resourceProperties.name: ifxFET_BUF_SIZE
resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable FET_BUF_SIZE.

resourceProperties.name: ifxDBTEMP

resourceProperties.description: The value for the Informix specific variable PROTOCOLTRACE.

resourceProperties.description: The name of the Data Source.
